CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Graph: Data Connect - Hybrid Workplace Analytics Template
CurrentVersion.description: Leverage Microsoft 365 data from Microsoft Graph Data Connect to obtain actionable information about the collaboration between people of the organization. Today’s challenges of a work environment that has shifted to embrace hybrid modalities often focus on designing the workplace for people success and wellbeing, as well as measuring the effectiveness of changes. By obtaining insights on how employees engage with hybrid work, managers can take action to identify and reduce employee churn, focus on inclusiveness, and optimize workplace setups for efficiency and employee satisfaction. This item is inaccurate and will be removed from the roadmap. We apologize for the inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: OneDrive Sync Account Detection
CurrentVersion.description: The OneDrive Sync client for work and school will show a one-time message to users who sign into a personal OneDrive account on their work machine. The message will only be shown if the personal OneDrive account is already available in the Windows account manager. The message will provide users a one-click option to configure their personal account with OneDrive.  If users choose to enable the feature, then they will be able to see both personal and work/school files in their work/school OneDrive and in File Explorer. Note: This is available in the Insiders channel for preview in July.  Standard launch date has now been changed to reflect the correct date. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.  This item is inaccurate and will be removed from the roadmap. We apologize for the inconvenience.

OldVersion.description: The OneDrive Sync client for work and school will show a one-time message to users who sign into a personal OneDrive account on their work machine. The message will only be shown if the personal OneDrive account is already available in the Windows account manager. The message will provide users a one-click option to configure their personal account with OneDrive.  If users choose to enable the feature, then they will be able to see both personal and work/school files in their work/school OneDrive and in File Explorer. Note: This is available in the Insiders channel for preview in July.  Standard launch date has now been changed to reflect the correct date. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection - Multi-policy selection
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now select multiple Insider Risk Management policies in the "Risk levels for Adaptive Protection" settings to assign risk levels in Adaptive Protection. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Overview page redesign
CurrentVersion.description:
After further review we have decided not to proceed with this change at this time. We apologize for any inconvenience.
The Microsoft 365 admin center Usage report Overview page has been redesigned to better navigate the most important usage insights in your organization. The redesign includes new engagement metrics such as enabled and active users, user state compositions (e.g. first time, returning users), storage by product, and key usage metrics for Microsoft 365 products. The cloud environments have been updated to show current standing. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot with enterprise data protection
CurrentVersion.description: A new product usage report will be added in the Microsoft 365 admin center, providing insights into active usage of Microsoft Copilot with enterprise data protection. The report will include total active users, average daily active users, and active users per platform (e.g. Microsoft 365 App, Edge, Copilot.cloud.microsoft). Usage insights can be viewed as totals and trends for the past 7, 30, 90, or 180-day periods. The report will also show the last activity date per user, anonymized by default.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection and Conditional Access
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations can use insider risk levels in their Conditional Access policies. This includes some minor experience changes in the Adaptive Protection tab in Insider Risk Management, including adding total counts for Conditional Access policies that use Adaptive Protection and new user insights in the user activity timeline when a user is added or removed from an insider risk level. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Advanced analytics
CurrentVersion.description: These updates to Amplify Reports and Analytics provide a series of improvements to the existing experience, such as large audience scenarios to better reflect reach across the enterprise. Viva Amplify reports will now be integrated with Campaign Brief and will also include historical data. This data will be available as graphs on the reports and to download as a CSV. There will also be features for copying charts as images and downloading to PowerPoint. The historical data experience provides unique views, promotions, and reactions for the last 7, 30, 90 days, and the last 12 months.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Required approval
CurrentVersion.description:
Coming soon, you'll be able to require approval at the campaign level for all your Amplify publications. The require approval feature brings compliance, accountability, and workflows to Lightweight Approvals in Amplify. By enabling required approval for a campaign, stakeholders can ensure that all campaign content adheres to organizational standards and receive the necessary approval before publishing, thus minimizing risks and errors. 

You can require approval at the campaign level so that all Amplify publications within the campaign go through the approval process before the content is published. This is an optional setting that a user can choose to apply to a campaign. By requiring approval, organizations can apply a significant level of quality and security to their content, ensuring every piece of content aligns perfectly with their standards and expectations before it is published.

You can require approval at the campaign level so that all Amplify publications within the campaign go through the approval process before the content is published. This is an optional setting that a user can choose to apply to a campaign. By requiring approval, organizations can apply a significant level of quality and security to their content, ensuring every piece of content aligns perfectly with their standards and expectations before it is published.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Copy a publication within a campaign
CurrentVersion.description: Gone are the days where you must rewrite or manually copy and paste content from an old publication to a newly drafted one to reuse it. Soon in Viva Amplify, you will be able to copy a publication within an existing campaign with just a few clicks. This new feature streamlines the content creation process, enabling communicators to easily reuse existing content across SharePoint, Outlook, and Teams, including all channel-specific customizations and related audiences, saving you time and effort.

CurrentVersion.description: All Users having Copilot SKU (Viva Learning Seeded and Premium) will be nudged about Copilot Academy through a notification on Teams. Users will also get a monthly recurring notification in Teams about Copilot Academy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Microsoft 365 Copilot extension usage
CurrentVersion.description: See usage of Microsoft 365 Copilot enabled apps (Copilot Extensions) in your organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Integrated apps and Copilot extensions
CurrentVersion.description: The Teams app usage report will be renamed to the Integrated Apps usage report and redesigned with new metrics and charts. These will provide insights into apps enabled for Teams, Outlook, Microsoft 365 apps, and Microsoft 365 Copilot (Copilot extensions) in your organization. The report will feature two sections: App Usage and User Activity. Insights will be organized by Publishing Type (Line-of-business apps, Microsoft partner apps, and Microsoft apps), Host Product (Teams, Microsoft 365 app, Outlook, Copilot), and Platform (Desktop, Mobile, Web). Additionally, the report will include views of app and user details.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot inference and evaluation policy for Copilot in Teams meetings
CurrentVersion.description: This policy enables IT admins to block Copilot responses that might infer emotions, make evaluations, discuss personal traits, and use context to deduce answers. When this setting is applied it restricts copilot’s ability to make inferences or evaluations about people or groups when prompted to do so by users. Users cannot disable this setting. The setting applies to Copilot in Teams meetings.

The setting applies to Copilot in Teams meetings.

CurrentVersion.description: The Copilot for Microsoft 365 team is working on supporting 12 new languages across all M365 Copilot features: Bulgarian, Croatian, Estonian, Greek, Indonesian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Romanian, Serbian (Latin), Slovak, Slovenia, and Vietnamese. They're also improving the handling of these language variants: Dutch (Belgium), German (Switzerland), English (UK), Spanish (Mexico), and French (Canada).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Host and attendee interaction visibility for multi-room Mesh events
CurrentVersion.description: Mesh event attendees can now see raised hands and reactions from attendees in other rooms during large, multi-room Mesh events. This creates a greater sense of audience feedback as a whole across all rooms in a Mesh event and increases total audience engagement.  Additionally, event hosts will now be able to move between all rooms in a multi-room Mesh event.

CurrentVersion.description: We will not release the Teams chat in Mesh events feature at this time. Participants in Mesh events on PC and Mac can use Teams chat to communicate with all participants, across all rooms, within a Mesh event. Users can do this in the Microsoft Mesh PC app as well as in the chat message list of the Teams app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Voice isolation on MacOS
CurrentVersion.description: With voice isolation, you can enjoy clear and uninterrupted calls or meetings, no matter where you are. Voice isolation is an AI based advanced noise suppression feature that eliminates unwanted background noise including other human voices. The technology recognizes your voice profile and ensures only your voice is transmitted. Voice isolation can be enabled for calls and meetings and will now be available on MacOS.

The technology recognizes your voice profile and ensures only your voice is transmitted. Voice isolation can be enabled for calls and meetings and will now be available on MacOS.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Room audio auto-detect and pre-select in BYOD meeting rooms
CurrentVersion.description: When users connect their laptop to a room's shared peripheral through USB, Teams automatically detects the room's audio and recommends connecting on the pre-join screen, streamlining the bring your own device (BYOD) meeting room experience. For room devices (e.g., displays, audio devices) recognized as shared and on Microsoft's known BYOD devices list, users will automatically transition to the room's audio upon connection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Participant roster grouping in Teams BYOD meeting rooms
CurrentVersion.description: When participants join a Teams meeting with their laptop in bring your own device (BYOD) meeting rooms, they will appear in the ‘in-room’ participant section of the roster enabling individual identification and meeting intelligence capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Mesh app on PC supports guest access for events
CurrentVersion.description: Mesh events allows for even better collaboration for more people by now supporting guest user attendees into the Mesh PC app. Event organizers can invite guest users outside their organization, providing an opportunity for broader collaboration and networking in Mesh events. Guests can sign in to the Mesh app to join events, participate in discussions, and experience the same interactive features as internal users, all while maintaining secure access control. Guest user creation follows the existing process for tenant guest user creation (outside of Mesh). For this release, guest users would require a Teams Premium license, just like regular tenant attendees, to collaborate within Mesh. Guest access for the Mesh app on Quest and support for anonymous participants will be supported in a future update.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Mesh app on PC supports guest access for events

Guests can sign in to the Mesh app to join events, participate in discussions, and experience the same interactive features as internal users, all while maintaining secure access control. Guest user creation follows the existing process for tenant guest user creation (outside of Mesh). For this release, guest users would require a Teams Premium license, just like regular tenant attendees, to collaborate within Mesh. Guest access for the Mesh app on Quest and support for anonymous participants will be supported in a future update.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative call delegation on Teams phone devices
CurrentVersion.description: Teams phone device users will be able to share access to their phone line with a specific group of users, without a structured delegation system. This enables group members to receive calls and initiate calls on behalf of others, enabling a simple and collaborative communication experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Modern Themes
CurrentVersion.description: Adding four new themes to Outlook for Windows and the Outlook Web App. These themes will bring more personalization and expressiveness to your email client.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Private moderator replies to individual attendees
CurrentVersion.description: Allows moderators to answer questions from specific attendees without displaying the reply to the other participants. This capability can be helpful for sensitive questions, personal inquiries, or follow-up discussions that are not intended to be broadcast to the entire audience.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Meeting details card for shared and delegated calendar invites
CurrentVersion.description: Delegates will be able to see the shared calendar event details, including the principal calendar, in the meeting details card on meeting invite messages. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Calendar in the inbox (CITI) card for shared calendar meeting invites
OldVersion.description: Delegates will be able to see the shared calendar event details, including the principal calendar, in the CITI card in the top drawer in meeting invite messages. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Microsoft 365 Copilot suggested users license assignment flow
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft 365 Copilot suggested user license assignment flow is a new feature in the Microsoft 365 admin center designed to help organizations streamline Microsoft 365 Copilot license assignment and optimize utilization. This feature uses a data-driven approach to suggest users who are in the best position to gain the most value from Microsoft 365 Copilot and efficiently assign licenses to these users.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Microsoft 365 Copilot license optimizer
OldVersion.description: Microsoft 365 Copilot license optimizer is a new feature in the Microsoft 365 admin center designed to help organizations streamline Microsoft 365 Copilot license assignment and optimize utilization. This feature uses a data-driven approach to suggest users who are in the best position to gain the most value from Microsoft 365 Copilot and efficiently assign licenses to these users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Event Chat for town halls
CurrentVersion.description: Previously in a town hall, only presenters and organizers could chat with each other. With this new update, attendees, presenters and organizers can now chat together during a town hall using the new Event Chat feature. Presenters and organizers can still chat privately during the town hall as well.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Analyst query notification email
CurrentVersion.description: We are launching a new feature for a Viva Insights Analyst who will be able to receive a query notification email that provides them with the status of their recently completed query. The notification email will be triggered both for a successful and failed query executed in Advanced Insights (Analyst workbench). Both custom queries and Power BI reports are in the scope of this feature. The Viva Insights Analyst can access the Analyst query notification email from their inbox.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: New data sync solution to Excel for the web in Microsoft OneDrive and SharePoint Online
CurrentVersion.description: New forms created from Microsoft OneDrive and SharePoint Online will use the new data sync solution.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - New Copilot adoption metrics and completing total actions taken
CurrentVersion.description: This adds seven new Copilot adoption metrics to the Copilot dashboard and Viva Insights Advanced insights. It also updates the "total actions taken" metric in the Copilot dashboard to include these new Copilot adoption metrics.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - New Business Chat prompts submitted through Teams
CurrentVersion.description: This adds new Business Chat prompts submitted through Teams metric to Copilot dashboard and Viva Insights Advanced insights.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Optical Character Recognition now supports hybrid PDFs (text and image)
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint OCR feature now extends support to hybrid PDFs, which contain both images and text. Previously, OCR was limited to image-only PDFs, but with this update, you can seamlessly extract and utilize text from hybrid documents.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Edge Settings Improvements
CurrentVersion.description: Edge Settings is migrating to WebUI2 to boost page responsiveness and introducing a series of minor visual and content upgrades to improve overall usability and utility. This includes optimizing for concise wording of individual settings, simplifying the number of pages and reorganizing content, and creating a cohesive user interface.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): UX Transparency for Web Queries
CurrentVersion.description: With UX transparency of web grounding in Copilot, users will now be able to see the exact queries sent by Copilot in response to a user's prompt to the web for grounding, along with the list of websites being queried, enhancing their awareness over the process.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved Microsoft Lists links in Teams messages
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Lists links in Teams including list item links and form links will now unfurl when shared in Teams messages making them easier to find and access within Teams messages and inside shared tab in chats.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Hide people previewing files in OneDrive and SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: This setting will allow administrators to disable the presence feature in the OneDrive and SharePoint file previewing experience on selected sites.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Data Loss Prevention (DLP) Policy tips revamp for New Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing new and improved DLP Policy tips in New Outlook for all E5 users. New DLP will support top DLP predicates and exceptions, all advanced classifiers, and override capabilities for E5 users. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity labels protection policy support for Microsoft Fabric
CurrentVersion.description: Your organization can now apply sensitivity labels in Microsoft Purview Information Protection to Microsoft Fabric workspaces. This new functionality will allow users to manually label Fabric items with their sensitivity level and then apply access control protections based upon the protection policies set by administrators.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - DLP support for Fabric Lakehouse
CurrentVersion.description: DLP policy support for Fabric will allow admins to further scope DLP policies to lakehouses  in addition to Power BI (which is supported today). Now in Fabric lakehouses, DLP policies can help audit and notify users through Policy Tips based upon sensitive content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Rewrite by Copilot in Edge is being upgraded to include enterprise data protection compliance standards
CurrentVersion.description:
Rewrite by Copilot in Edge, which lets users edit typed text for tone, format, and length within an open page in Microsoft Edge, is being updated to include enterprise data protection for commercial customers. Once Rewrite is available, users signed in with a Microsoft Entra ID will have enterprise data protection when using the feature in Microsoft Edge.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/copilot/edge

within PowerPoint Slideshow and presenter view in Desktop. This item is inaccurate and will be removed from the roadmap. We apologize for the inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.description: New advanced editing capabilities available in the Image web part will include adjustments, filters, and markup. This item is inaccurate and will be removed from the roadmap. We apologize for the inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Access Lists, Forms, Sway & PowerBI content in OneDrive Web
CurrentVersion.description: We're adding the capability to surface Lists, Forms, Sway and PowerBI content in the OneDrive Home, Shared and Favorites experiences within OneDrive Web. This item is inaccurate and will be removed from the roadmap. We apologize for the inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Change history in SharePoint admin center
CurrentVersion.description: Create and download change history reports in the SharePoint admin center to review SharePoint site property changes made within the last 180 days. This item is inaccurate and will be removed from the roadmap. We apologize for the inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Insert Local Picture in Cell
CurrentVersion.description:
Pictures in Cells are getting better! Now you
can insert a local picture from your device into the cell, paste it from your
clipboard or convert a floating picture and put it in the cell easily! This item is inaccurate and will be removed from the roadmap. We apologize for the inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Updated site creation experience
CurrentVersion.description:
With this update, you will choose a site
template based on your scenario to get started creating your site. When
choosing a template you can see its capabilities, and even see a preview. This
change will help site owners through the process by simplifying and providing
additional guidance while creating the site. This item is inaccurate and will be removed from the roadmap. We apologize for the inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: OneDrive Sync Account Detection
CurrentVersion.description: The OneDrive Sync client for work and school will show a one-time message to users who sign into a personal OneDrive account on their work machine. The message will only be shown if the personal OneDrive account is already available in the Windows account manager. The message will provide users a one-click option to configure their personal account with OneDrive.  If users choose to enable the feature, then they will be able to see both personal and work/school files in their work/school OneDrive and in File Explorer. Note: This is available in the Insiders channel for preview in July.  Standard launch date has now been changed to reflect the correct date. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.  This item is inaccurate and will be removed from the roadmap. We apologize for the inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Message vertical in Office.com now available in DoD
CurrentVersion.description: Looking for a message, but you can't remember whether it was in Teams or Outlook? Search for it in Office.com and then go to the Messages Tab. You'll get both Teams and Outlook messages in the list of results. Now available in DoD. This item is inaccurate and will be removed from the roadmap. We apologize for the inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Bulk Import Teams in Viva Goals
CurrentVersion.description: With the bulk import of teams, administrators and anyone with the permission to create teams will be able to create multiple teams at a time by importing them from an external source using an Excel template. This will also enable creation of organization hierarchy and addition of members into these teams by adding groups, as part of the team creation process. This item is inaccurate and will be removed from the roadmap. We apologize for the inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Improved Phased Target Feature to Reflect Child Objectives and Key Results
CurrentVersion.description:
Customers who want to factor seasonality into tracking progress can
now set expected targets for specific time periods at the child key objective
and key result level and see the progress reflected in the parent objective or
key result. This item is inaccurate and will be removed from the roadmap. We apologize for the inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: @ mentions within comments
CurrentVersion.description: The ability to @ mention users within comments on a whiteboard, with the associated in-app indicators to inform users of an @ mention.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Email notifications for @ mentions in comments on a whiteboard
CurrentVersion.description: The ability for @mentions within comments on a whiteboard to trigger an email notification to the user, with a link back to the @mention.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: pay-as-you-go for structured models
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Syntex users will be able to use their Azure subscription to pay for Syntex structured and freeform models on a pay-as-you-go basis. This item is inaccurate and will be removed from the roadmap. We apologize for the inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Tagging for commercial users in the Microsoft 365 app for web and desktop
CurrentVersion.description: Tagging in the Microsoft 365 and web and desktop apps is a new, intuitive way for commercial users to organize their work independent of where files are stored. Find the new 'Tags' feature in the 'My Content' section of the Microsoft 365 App. This feature is only available to users who have OneDrive provisioned. This item is inaccurate and will be removed from the roadmap. We apologize for the inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection - Multi-policy selection
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now select multiple Insider Risk Management policies in the "Risk levels for Adaptive Protection" settings to assign risk levels in Adaptive Protection. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Review set query report
CurrentVersion.description: Within a review set, generate and download a hit-by-term report on a KQL query. Quickly see the count and volume of the items hit on a particular keyword or a list of compound queries.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity labels to protect Microsoft Teams shared channels
CurrentVersion.description: Sensitivity labels will protect Microsoft Teams shared controls with sharing and discovery controls. Note: The release phase and rollout start month have been updated to show current status. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: New sensitivity bar in Microsoft 365 apps on Mac for viewing and applying sensitivity labels powered by Microsoft Purview
CurrentVersion.description: Sensitivity bar provides a more prominent and contextual user experience for viewing and applying sensitivity labels in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook on Mac. This item is inaccurate and will be removed from the roadmap. We apologize for the inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Overview page redesign
CurrentVersion.description:
After further review we have decided not to proceed with this change at this time. We apologize for any inconvenience.
The Microsoft 365 admin center Usage report Overview page has been redesigned to better navigate the most important usage insights in your organization. The redesign includes new engagement metrics such as enabled and active users, user state compositions (e.g. first time, returning users), storage by product, and key usage metrics for Microsoft 365 products. The cloud environments have been updated to show current standing. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Add premium capabilities to Planner
CurrentVersion.description: Add premium capabilities like sprint planning, people view, goals, custom fields, and task history to your plans within the Planner Teams app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Private thumbnail using SharePoint links for courses
CurrentVersion.description: Private thumbnail using SharePoint links for courses hosted at SuccessFactors can be displayed at Viva Learning.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Customize your individual sites and experiences with fonts and themes
CurrentVersion.description: Site owners will now be able to create branded fonts and themes for their sites and experiences in the brand center by combining the branding assets that the organization provides or by creating their own.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: To Do app opens in the Classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the tittle and description to highlight that this feature is coming to the Classic Outlook for Windows, we apologize for the inconvenience it might have caused. Use the To Do app without leaving the Classic Outlook for Windows! Click the To Do icon in the navigation bar to open inline without opening in a separate browser window.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot with enterprise data protection
CurrentVersion.description: A new product usage report will be added in the Microsoft 365 admin center, providing insights into active usage of Microsoft Copilot with enterprise data protection. The report will include total active users, average daily active users, and active users per platform (e.g. Microsoft 365 App, Edge, Copilot.cloud.microsoft). Usage insights can be viewed as totals and trends for the past 7, 30, 90, or 180-day periods. The report will also show the last activity date per user, anonymized by default.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workflows within File Chiclet
CurrentVersion.description: You will now be able to run instant workflows and create new file workflows via the file chiclet overflow menu (...)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Review set query report
CurrentVersion.description: Within a review set, generate and download a hit-by-term report on a KQL query. Quickly see the count and volume of the items hit on a particular keyword or a list of compound queries.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - eDiscovery Graph API for purge enhancements to include Exchange items and expand purge limit from 10 to 100
CurrentVersion.description: Now eDiscovery admins using the eDiscovery Graph APIs for purge to remove misplaced emails and or Teams messages from their storage locations can use the eDiscovery Graph API for both Exchange email items and Teams messages. In addition, the prior limit of 10 items per storage location will be expanded to 100 items per storage location.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab - Share a prompt to a Microsoft Teams team
CurrentVersion.description: Share custom prompts with members of a Microsoft Teams team, allowing team members to easily discover and utilize these prompts in Copilot Lab.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Entry point change - apps when reading emails moved to the ribbon
CurrentVersion.description: The Apps flyout and entry point for pinned apps will be moved to the Home tab in the Ribbon in the New Outlook and Outlook for Web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updates to in-app feedback experience and policies for Desktop & Web clients
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the Settings menu for “Help & Feedback” and the in-app “Give Feedback/Suggest a Feature” experience for Teams Desktop & Web clients. Teams Desktop and Web clients will no longer use Microsoft Teams feedback policies for the in-app “Give Feedback/Suggest a Feature” experience, and instead use the Cloud Policy service for Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Access: Modern Chart Improvements
CurrentVersion.description: A top ask from customers is to modernize Access charts and to support better data visualization in Access. To satisfy this user request, we are integrating a new charting package called “Ivy” into Access. Ivy is a charting package written by the Office DVX team that is currently used in Excel, Word, and PowerPoint.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Meeting Details in the Reading Pane on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: When a conversation in Mail is part of a meeting, the Reading Pane will have a new and improved Meeting Details card for a more efficient and modern RSVP flow. This will come to Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared tab in chat
CurrentVersion.description: The Files tab in chat is now ‘Shared’. The shared tab shows all the files and links that were sent in the chat, making it easier to find them- all in one place. Channels are not affected by this change.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Auto-labeling policies support Fingerprinting SITs
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now automatically label files and emails with Fingerprinting SITs via auto-labeling policies.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Voting, Filtering, Sorting, and Archiving Questions now available in the Q&A App on Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Take your Q&A to the next level with this new update that lets attendees vote on the questions they want presenters to answer. Organizers can sort questions by most voted, filter, and archive questions to keep the discussion focused in meetings and events.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection and Conditional Access
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations can use insider risk levels in their Conditional Access policies. This includes some minor experience changes in the Adaptive Protection tab in Insider Risk Management, including adding total counts for Conditional Access policies that use Adaptive Protection and new user insights in the user activity timeline when a user is added or removed from an insider risk level. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab - Share a prompt with a coworker
CurrentVersion.description: Easily create, save, and share your favorite prompts using Copilot Lab, inspiring your co-workers to acheive more with Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab - New and trending prompts
CurrentVersion.description: Keep track of new and trending prompts in your organization in Copilot Lab.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatically set work location on bookable desks
CurrentVersion.description: The user's work location can be automatically set to 'In the office' upon plug-in to peripherals at a bookable desk. Once IT enables the policy for a tenant or a group, users can opt-in to automatically update their location making it easier to connect with co-workers when they are in the office.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: EDU tenant type selection in policy wizard
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now select tenant type for their institution from the policy wizard. This setting can be changed anytime from the wizard.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: IPv6 allow and block support in Tenant Allow/Block List
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can create allow and block entries for IPv6 directly inside the Tenant Allow/Block List.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Third party add-in user report can be sent to Microsoft for analysis
CurrentVersion.description: Admins and security analysts of organizations who use a third-party reporting add-in in Outlook can configure using user-reported settings to send their user reports to Microsoft for analysis and learning.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Calendar grid keyboard navigation via arrow keys in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: When focused on the calendar grid, you will be able to navigate the time slots on the calendar via left/right/up/down arrow keys in day, week, and work week views. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Advanced analytics
CurrentVersion.description: These updates to Amplify Reports and Analytics provide a series of improvements to the existing experience, such as large audience scenarios to better reflect reach across the enterprise. Viva Amplify reports will now be integrated with Campaign Brief and will also include historical data. This data will be available as graphs on the reports and to download as a CSV. There will also be features for copying charts as images and downloading to PowerPoint. The historical data experience provides unique views, promotions, and reactions for the last 7, 30, 90 days, and the last 12 months.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance- Enrich triage in Communication compliance with Insider Risk context
CurrentVersion.description: Enhance the triage experience in communication compliance with Insider Risk Insights. This integration provides investigators a deeper understanding of the risk profile of message senders along with a more comprehensive view of the sender's risk severity and historical risk-related actions. With this enriched context, investigators are empowered to make more informed and effective remediation decisions, ensuring a robust compliance posture.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Required approval
CurrentVersion.description:
Coming soon, you'll be able to require approval at the campaign level for all your Amplify publications. The require approval feature brings compliance, accountability, and workflows to Lightweight Approvals in Amplify. By enabling required approval for a campaign, stakeholders can ensure that all campaign content adheres to organizational standards and receive the necessary approval before publishing, thus minimizing risks and errors. 

You can require approval at the campaign level so that all Amplify publications within the campaign go through the approval process before the content is published. This is an optional setting that a user can choose to apply to a campaign. By requiring approval, organizations can apply a significant level of quality and security to their content, ensuring every piece of content aligns perfectly with their standards and expectations before it is published.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Copy a publication within a campaign
CurrentVersion.description: Gone are the days where you must rewrite or manually copy and paste content from an old publication to a newly drafted one to reuse it. Soon in Viva Amplify, you will be able to copy a publication within an existing campaign with just a few clicks. This new feature streamlines the content creation process, enabling communicators to easily reuse existing content across SharePoint, Outlook, and Teams, including all channel-specific customizations and related audiences, saving you time and effort.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy Nudges to all Copilot SKU users (Seeded and Premium Viva Learning Users)
CurrentVersion.description: All Users having Copilot SKU (Viva Learning Seeded and Premium) will be nudged about Copilot Academy through a notification on Teams. Users will also get a monthly recurring notification in Teams about Copilot Academy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Microsoft 365 Copilot extension usage
CurrentVersion.description: See usage of Microsoft 365 Copilot enabled apps (Copilot Extensions) in your organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Integrated apps and Copilot extensions
CurrentVersion.description: The Teams app usage report will be renamed to the Integrated Apps usage report and redesigned with new metrics and charts. These will provide insights into apps enabled for Teams, Outlook, Microsoft 365 apps, and Microsoft 365 Copilot (Copilot extensions) in your organization. The report will feature two sections: App Usage and User Activity. Insights will be organized by Publishing Type (Line-of-business apps, Microsoft partner apps, and Microsoft apps), Host Product (Teams, Microsoft 365 app, Outlook, Copilot), and Platform (Desktop, Mobile, Web). Additionally, the report will include views of app and user details.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot inference and evaluation policy for Copilot in Teams meetings
CurrentVersion.description: This policy enables IT admins to block Copilot responses that might infer emotions, make evaluations, discuss personal traits, and use context to deduce answers. When this setting is applied it restricts copilot’s ability to make inferences or evaluations about people or groups when prompted to do so by users. Users cannot disable this setting. The setting applies to Copilot in Teams meetings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Language expansion coming in M365 Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: The Copilot for Microsoft 365 team is working on supporting 12 new languages across all M365 Copilot features: Bulgarian, Croatian, Estonian, Greek, Indonesian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Romanian, Serbian (Latin), Slovak, Slovenia, and Vietnamese. They're also improving the handling of these language variants: Dutch (Belgium), German (Switzerland), English (UK), Spanish (Mexico), and French (Canada).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Refreshed view of all your teams and channels page
CurrentVersion.description: A new ‘your teams and channels’ view provides you with a centralized hub where you can see all your teams and navigate to their channels from one page. This interface streamlines your workflows, enabling you to quickly access and manage your teams and channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - AI & Copilot Resources provider
CurrentVersion.description: The AI & Copilot Resources provider will power the OOB Microsoft Copilot Academy and will be visible by default to users who have Copilot licenses. Admins will be able to enable, disable, and apply permissions on the content of this provider.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ability to duplicate Microsoft Copilot Academy
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to duplicate Copilot Academy and customize it for their own requirements. They will also be able to duplicate Microsoft curated Learning paths and featured Set.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Host and attendee interaction visibility for multi-room Mesh events
CurrentVersion.description: Mesh event attendees can now see raised hands and reactions from attendees in other rooms during large, multi-room Mesh events. This creates a greater sense of audience feedback as a whole across all rooms in a Mesh event and increases total audience engagement.  Additionally, event hosts will now be able to move between all rooms in a multi-room Mesh event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams chat support in Mesh events
CurrentVersion.description: We will not release the Teams chat in Mesh events feature at this time. We are sorry for any inconvenience and will continue to share updated roadmap entries as additional Mesh features and functionality become available in Teams. Participants in Mesh events on PC and Mac can use Teams chat to communicate with all participants, across all rooms, within a Mesh event. Users can do this in the Microsoft Mesh PC app as well as in the chat message list of the Teams app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Voice isolation on MacOS
CurrentVersion.description: With voice isolation, you can enjoy clear and uninterrupted calls or meetings, no matter where you are. Voice isolation is an AI based advanced noise suppression feature that eliminates unwanted background noise including other human voices. The technology recognizes your voice profile and ensures only your voice is transmitted. Voice isolation can be enabled for calls and meetings and will now be available on MacOS.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Copy list of attendees to clipboard
CurrentVersion.description: Allow users to copy the list of attendees to clipboard from calendar event. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Search - query suggestions
CurrentVersion.description: Now you can form search queries quickly and efficiently with enhanced people-query suggestions. Start typing a person name in the search bar, and get recommendations based on results most relevant to you.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: People module improvements on new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: In the new Outlook for Windows, the people module offers a streamlined contacts interface with a single view of each person, automatically linking duplicates and enriching them with organizational profiles.  #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Collaborative authoring
CurrentVersion.description: Multiple authors can collaborate on a Viva Amplify publication at the same time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Room audio auto-detect and pre-select in BYOD meeting rooms
CurrentVersion.description: When users connect their laptop to a room's shared peripheral through USB, Teams automatically detects the room's audio and recommends connecting on the pre-join screen, streamlining the bring your own device (BYOD) meeting room experience. For room devices (e.g., displays, audio devices) recognized as shared and on Microsoft's known BYOD devices list, users will automatically transition to the room's audio upon connection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Participant roster grouping in Teams BYOD meeting rooms
CurrentVersion.description: When participants join a Teams meeting with their laptop in bring your own device (BYOD) meeting rooms, they will appear in the ‘in-room’ participant section of the roster enabling individual identification and meeting intelligence capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Mesh app on PC supports guest access for events
CurrentVersion.description: Mesh events allows for even better collaboration for more people by now supporting guest user attendees into the Mesh PC app. Event organizers can invite guest users outside their organization, providing an opportunity for broader collaboration and networking in Mesh events. Guests can sign in to the Mesh app to join events, participate in discussions, and experience the same interactive features as internal users, all while maintaining secure access control. Guest user creation follows the existing process for tenant guest user creation (outside of Mesh). For this release, guest users would require a Teams Premium license, just like regular tenant attendees, to collaborate within Mesh. Guest access for the Mesh app on Quest and support for anonymous participants will be supported in a future update.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Customer Facing Reports via Insights Integration
CurrentVersion.description: Org level breakdown of Learning metrics in Viva Insights.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Network Strength icon to understand strength of your network
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly understand strength of your network along with suggestions to conserve bandwidth if you are experiencing networking issues.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Dashboard - Non-Copilot cohort and exclusion list using AAD Groups (Entra ID)
CurrentVersion.description: For the Copilot dashboard, the non-Copilot user cohort list and exclusion list can be managed by Global Administrators using AAD (Azure Active Directory) Groups.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Offline app boot
CurrentVersion.description: This introduces the ability to open or restart the new Outlook for Windows when not connected to the internet. Previously, you needed a connection to the internet to open or restart the new Outlook. Offline access is only supported when the app is already running and then goes offline. Opening and restarting the app while offline will be introduced with this rollout. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Enrich triage in Communication Compliance with Insider Risk context
CurrentVersion.description: Enhance the triage experience in communication compliance with Insider Risk Insights. This integration provides investigators with a deeper understanding of the risk profile of message senders, along with a more comprehensive view of the sender’s risk severity and historical risk-related actions. With this enriched context, investigators are empowered to make more informed and effective remediation decisions, ensuring a robust compliance posture.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cloud IntelliFrame video feed support extended to Teams Rooms on Android and Teams mobile devices
CurrentVersion.description: Cloud IntelliFrame, the video framing feature that enhances the visibility of people in the room for online meeting attendees, is now available for Teams Rooms on Android and Teams Mobile users when they join a meeting that has participants in a Teams Rooms on Windows.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Microsoft 365 Copilot Usage report - Business Chat
CurrentVersion.description: The Microsoft 365 Copilot usage report in the Microsoft 365 admin center will be updated to include usage of Microsoft 365 Copilot Business Chat (web) along with the existing usage data for Business Chat (work). It will also include enabled users and active users adoption information for new entry points Edge and Microsoft 365 App for Microsoft 365 Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Sync - Shared Item Delete and Local Mass Delete Confirmation Dialogs
CurrentVersion.description: We are shipping an items delete confirmation that will trigger when the user is about to delete shared items. This UI format will also replace the existing mass delete experience. These confirmations will occur when files are deleted from File Explorer when the user is running OneDrive and not paused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Scope shared or delegated mailbox access for emails in Business Chat
CurrentVersion.description: Scope Copilot queries in emails for shared or delegated mailboxes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative call delegation on Teams phone devices
CurrentVersion.description: Teams phone device users will be able to share access to their phone line with a specific group of users, without a structured delegation system. This enables group members to receive calls and initiate calls on behalf of others, enabling a simple and collaborative communication experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Modern Themes
CurrentVersion.description: Adding four new themes to Outlook for Windows and the Outlook Web App. These themes will bring more personalization and expressiveness to your email client.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Private moderator replies to individual attendees
CurrentVersion.description: Allows moderators to answer questions from specific attendees without displaying the reply to the other participants. This capability can be helpful for sensitive questions, personal inquiries, or follow-up discussions that are not intended to be broadcast to the entire audience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Private moderator replies to individual attendees
CurrentVersion.description: Allows moderators to answer questions from specific attendees without displaying the reply to the other participants. This capability can be helpful for sensitive questions, personal inquiries, or follow-up discussions that are not intended to be broadcast to the entire audience.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Meeting details card for shared and delegated calendar invites
CurrentVersion.description: Delegates will be able to see the shared calendar event details, including the principal calendar, in the meeting details card on meeting invite messages. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Microsoft 365 Copilot suggested users license assignment flow
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft 365 Copilot suggested user license assignment flow is a new feature in the Microsoft 365 admin center designed to help organizations streamline Microsoft 365 Copilot license assignment and optimize utilization. This feature uses a data-driven approach to suggest users who are in the best position to gain the most value from Microsoft 365 Copilot and efficiently assign licenses to these users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Event Chat for town halls
CurrentVersion.description: Previously in a town hall, only presenters and organizers could chat with each other. With this new update, attendees, presenters and organizers can now chat together during a town hall using the new Event Chat feature. Presenters and organizers can still chat privately during the town hall as well.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Analyst query notification email
CurrentVersion.description: We are launching a new feature for a Viva Insights Analyst who will be able to receive a query notification email that provides them with the status of their recently completed query. The notification email will be triggered both for a successful and failed query executed in Advanced Insights (Analyst workbench). Both custom queries and Power BI reports are in the scope of this feature. The Viva Insights Analyst can access the Analyst query notification email from their inbox.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: New data sync solution to Excel for the web in Microsoft OneDrive and SharePoint Online
CurrentVersion.description: New forms created from Microsoft OneDrive and SharePoint Online will use the new data sync solution.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - New Copilot adoption metrics and completing total actions taken
CurrentVersion.description: This adds seven new Copilot adoption metrics to the Copilot dashboard and Viva Insights Advanced insights. It also updates the "total actions taken" metric in the Copilot dashboard to include these new Copilot adoption metrics.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - New Business Chat prompts submitted through Teams
CurrentVersion.description: This adds new Business Chat prompts submitted through Teams metric to Copilot dashboard and Viva Insights Advanced insights.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Optical Character Recognition now supports hybrid PDFs (text and image)
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint OCR feature now extends support to hybrid PDFs, which contain both images and text. Previously, OCR was limited to image-only PDFs, but with this update, you can seamlessly extract and utilize text from hybrid documents.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Edge Settings Improvements
CurrentVersion.description: Edge Settings is migrating to WebUI2 to boost page responsiveness and introducing a series of minor visual and content upgrades to improve overall usability and utility. This includes optimizing for concise wording of individual settings, simplifying the number of pages and reorganizing content, and creating a cohesive user interface.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): UX Transparency for Web Queries
CurrentVersion.description: With UX transparency of web grounding in Copilot, users will now be able to see the exact queries sent by Copilot in response to a user's prompt to the web for grounding, along with the list of websites being queried, enhancing their awareness over the process.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved Microsoft Lists links in Teams messages
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Lists links in Teams including list item links and form links will now unfurl when shared in Teams messages making them easier to find and access within Teams messages and inside shared tab in chats.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Hide people previewing files in OneDrive and SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: This setting will allow administrators to disable the presence feature in the OneDrive and SharePoint file previewing experience on selected sites.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Data Loss Prevention (DLP) Policy tips revamp for New Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing new and improved DLP Policy tips in New Outlook for all E5 users. New DLP will support top DLP predicates and exceptions, all advanced classifiers, and override capabilities for E5 users. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity labels protection policy support for Microsoft Fabric
CurrentVersion.description: Your organization can now apply sensitivity labels in Microsoft Purview Information Protection to Microsoft Fabric workspaces. This new functionality will allow users to manually label Fabric items with their sensitivity level and then apply access control protections based upon the protection policies set by administrators.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - DLP support for Fabric Lakehouse
CurrentVersion.description: DLP policy support for Fabric will allow admins to further scope DLP policies to lakehouses  in addition to Power BI (which is supported today). Now in Fabric lakehouses, DLP policies can help audit and notify users through Policy Tips based upon sensitive content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Rewrite by Copilot in Edge is being upgraded to include enterprise data protection compliance standards
CurrentVersion.description:
Rewrite by Copilot in Edge, which lets users edit typed text for tone, format, and length within an open page in Microsoft Edge, is being updated to include enterprise data protection for commercial customers. Once Rewrite is available, users signed in with a Microsoft Entra ID will have enterprise data protection when using the feature in Microsoft Edge.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/copilot/edge
